mapper.update: update cms_topic set category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, attend_count = #{attendCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attention_count = #{attentionCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, read_count = #{readCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, award_name = #{awardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attend_type = #{attendType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, category_id, `name`, create_time, start_time, end_time, attend_count, attention_count, read_count, award_name, attend_type, content from cms_topic where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, category_id, `name`, create_time, start_time, end_time, attend_count, attention_count, read_count, award_name, attend_type, content from cms_topic
